text.intro:
Australian far-right organisations and individuals present in Time State 1 (TS1). TS1 encompasses organisations and individuals pre-World War II and those present directly after, between 1945-1955. 
Please feel free to explore the network by directly interacting with it. 
 You can use the search bar below to search for nodes by name. When you select a node in the network please refer to the pop-up panel on the right-hand side for details about that node, including its organisational form, ideology, centrality scores, modularity and all connected nodes.
text.title: Australian far-right network (Time State 1)
